text: Consider the following schedule: S: R2(A), W1(B), W1(C), R3(B), R2(B), R1(A), C1, R2(C), C2, W3(a), C3; Which one of the following statements is correct about above schedule? (@) S is allowed by 2PL, but is not serializable. (b) S is serializable, but does not allow by 2PL. (Â©) S is neither serializable nor allowed by 2PL. (S is both serializable and allowed by 2PL.
